replies.body: Urgot is not even close to be one of the top 10 after the gutting of his W shield.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z97yMcOb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-25T16:52:54.222+0000)
>
> Urgot is not even close to be one of the top 10 after the gutting of his W shield.

who do you think is top 10 that isnt on this list then?
Q adjustment would easily knock him down a few pegs.

Camille is trash, Urgot is literally the worst champion in the entire lane right now.

Where's Yorick? I think he's the best champ in all of League on this patch. Riven would be a close second, and she's missing too.

> [{quoted}](name=Sucction,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z97yMcOb,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-02-26T14:48:43.626+0000)
>
> Camille is trash, Urgot is literally the worst champion in the entire lane right now.
> 
> Where's Yorick? I think he's the best champ in all of League on this patch. Riven would be a close second, and she's missing too.

Camille isn't trash LMAO

> [{quoted}](name=ThisGamelsTrash,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z97yMcOb,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2019-02-26T15:43:38.580+0000)
>
> Camille isn't trash LMAO

She can't make good use of spear and Conqueror doesn't do much for her. She's just a worse version of Fiora who trades all dueling power for some better roaming tools.

I just can't see a reason you'd ever pick her top. What's the point? Everybody does what she does better.

Are we talking design or are we talking fun or are we talking how good they are? I'm guessing how good they are if urgot is on that list LOL.
As a guy with 1million mastery points on Irelia I can't say she's better than jax right now. Garen is good but only in low elo. Jayce is good but only if the jayce is good. Sion is fair, I think cam should be higher, darius is good but only at low elo (should be higher than garen too) Urgot is reasonable, Jax and Fiora should be higher, and I think Renekton is fair but should be a bit higher. Riven should probably be on the list, Gnar should definitely be on that list.

> [{quoted}](name=Calebindestrctbl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z97yMcOb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-02-25T17:24:57.713+0000)
>
> Are we talking design or are we talking fun or are we talking how good they are? I'm guessing how good they are if urgot is on that list LOL.
> As a guy with 1million mastery points on Irelia I can't say she's better than jax right now. Garen is good but only in low elo. Jayce is good but only if the jayce is good. Sion is fair, I think cam should be higher, darius is good but only at low elo (should be higher than garen too) Urgot is reasonable, Jax and Fiora should be higher, and I think Renekton is fair but should be a bit higher. Riven should probably be on the list, Gnar should definitely be on that list.

Eh I don't think Riven or Gnar are top 10 best, especially Riven. I don't see her beating any of these champs.
riven is literally top tier and a giant spear and conqueror abuser, shes very good atm

I think that Gnar is uber slept on. He's a poke kite tank, enough said. Better than Garen/Urgot at any rate.
I'd say that Riven is really high up there because she's viable in pretty much any meta unless the meta is flat out broken *cough ardent censor cough*. I'd say that Riven is kind of like an easier Jayce. Sure, her mechanics are very hard to pull off, but Jayce is extremely complex from a thinking perspective, this is best represented by the gap of Korean and Western Jayces.
He's uber slept on because he's very boring to play.
Is he boring to play? He's so oppressive and such freelo and his ults and splitpushing and e are fun. At any rate he's strong.

What about repeatedly autoing someone from afar with a 3 hit passive and having survivability gated behind a form that you can try to get before being one shot but would likely end up dead before form changing, is fun? He's basically a slightly more tanky Kennen but with stuns and tank stats gated behind a form. And no one likes playing as or against Kennen as a top main.
Mm, that's so opressive that it's fun. And my aforementioned reasons stand.

> [{quoted}](name=Calebindestrctbl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z97yMcOb,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2019-02-25T20:38:17.900+0000)
>
> I think that Gnar is uber slept on. He's a poke kite tank, enough said. Better than Garen/Urgot at any rate.
> I'd say that Riven is really high up there because she's viable in pretty much any meta unless the meta is flat out broken *cough ardent censor cough*. I'd say that Riven is kind of like an easier Jayce. Sure, her mechanics are very hard to pull off, but Jayce is extremely complex from a thinking perspective, this is best represented by the gap of Korean and Western Jayces.

I don't know if this is just me, but whenever I play riven it feels like I do no damage at all. It's just too hard to win lane with her if I don't get help from junglers. She easily gets shitted on a LOT of top lane champs. and Jayce is actually very easy for me to play. Just get aery and poke the shit out of them not letting them farm. as long as you know how to manage your mana then Jayce isn't that hard.

I wouldn't say Riven has a bad laning phase. She's pretty good against ranged champions because of her e. She can beat a lot of juggernauts as long as the Riven player knows how to play the matchups. She can do really good against bruisers as long as she uses her abilities correctly. you could make a case that Jayce has a lower skill floor, but I'd say skill ceiling being lower is better.
Urgot is not reasonable if we talk how good they are. The latest nerf killed him completely.
He's definitely not a well designed champion or a fun champion at any rate. I don't know how good he is atm so I'll give you the benefit of the doubt there.
Yeah, same applies to Irelia tho (not well designed nor fun). But like I said, it is about how good they are and the latest nerf to Urgots W shield basically blew him out of existence.

I don't know what you mean by same thing applies to Irelia? My point was that she didn't deserve to be higher than Jax because she's not as good. Also you could call Irelia poorly designed (and I'm inclined to agree with you), but Irelia is 100% a fun champion.
Pressing q a bunch and deleting an entire minion wave is actually pretty fun, ngl
ngl your comment taught me the meaning of ngl. Nice. Good luck in soloQ for teaching me that.
danky shins fellow top lane brother.
Google autocorrects that to donkey shine. ROFL

One thing i'll give you is that you didn't put Aatrox up there. I don't think enough people understand the gravity of the situation the champ is in currently. His only strength just got practically removed.

Fiora really isn't that good to be honest. I'm currently considering maining another champion. She is too easily countered in lane and she has poor team fighting so if you get a feeding team, you're fucked. She doesn't belong on that list in my opinion.
garen is on it so nahhh
Depends actually, he can go from top 20 to top 10 in good matchups.

top as in based on the meta.

as far as i know garen is only good on lower elos and just fall the higher you go
Fake news, {{champion:48}} is all of them at the same time.
yeah I completely forgot about Yorick. I'd replace him with Renekton and put him top 5 at least
Karma can be pretty strong in the top lane as well. Especially if she's going AP Tank, she has damage but so much survivability with her heal, especially if it's against melee enemies.

I agree, {{champion:83}} Yorick is insane right now.  He should deff be #1.  He's also #1 on this [tier list](https://www.mobachampion.com/tier-list/).  After that, I'd say probably other tanks or bruisers for top lane, such as {{champion:14}}, {{champion:92}} , or {{champion:39}}. Garen {{champion:86}}  is only good in low ELOs. He does very poorly in high ELOs where he's predictable.  A lot of people are taking very squishy champs in the mid and jungle, so bruisers and off tanks are great choices to out last them while still dealing great damage.

Irelia is still good, but Yorick is the best imo (kinda op), and Riven definitely needs to be somewhere on there. I'd put Irelia and Urgot lower, and Darius, Jax, and maybe Renekton higher. Vlad might deserve a spot too.
